passwordCase: At least one lowercase and one uppercase letter
wrongOldPassword: Oops! How did you manage to get in? Your previous password is incorrect.
newPasswordLikeOldPasswort: Oops! Your new password looks a lot like the old one.
newPasswordsNotMatching: Oops! Your passwords do not match.
mainDescription: Welcome to the Smart Urban Gardening Assistant! This intuitive platform helps you manage your plants effortlessly. The header features a search function and an option to add plants. You can also adjust language settings, personalize user preferences, or securely log out. Below, stay informed about crucial environmental conditions for your plants. A convenient table summarizes key details of all your plants, making management a breeze
loginDescription: Welcome to the Smart Urban Gardening Assistant, your personalized gardening companion! To get started, please log in using your credentials
registerLink: New to Smart Urban Gardening Assistant? Click here to create a new account. Explore the world of urban gardening with our smart features!
wrongCredentials: Oops! It seems that the username or password is incorrect
